title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2407/97 of 3 December 1997 on additional quantities of textile products to be made available to Vietnam
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2407/97 of 3 December 1997 on additional quantities of textile products to be made available to Vietnam
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following additional quantities shall be made available to Vietnam, for which it can issue export licences during the quota year 1997:
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
